name: smart-spotify
description: A React + Express Spotify integration app with authentication, playlist viewing, and library search

scripts.build: pnpm --filter shared build && concurrently "pnpm --filter frontend build" "pnpm --filter backend build"
scripts.lint: concurrently "pnpm --filter shared lint" "pnpm --filter frontend lint" "pnpm --filter backend lint"
scripts.lint:fix: pnpm --filter shared lint:fix && pnpm --filter frontend lint:fix && pnpm --filter backend lint:fix
